root-directory.title: Root Directory
root-directory.desc: The root directory of your project. This is the directory that will be deployed to Zeabur.

custom-build-command.title: Custom Build Command
custom-build-command.desc: Customize the build command for your project.

custom-start-command.title: Custom Start Command
custom-start-command.desc: Customize the start command for your project.

output-dir.title: Custom Output Directory
output-dir.desc: The directory that contains the build output of your project. If you specify a directory, we will deploy your service as static files with Nginx.

watch-path.title: Watch Paths
watch-path.desc: Gitignore-style patterns that can be used to trigger new deployments based on what file paths have changed.

branch.title: Switch Branch
branch.desc: Binding another branch of your project
